summary:
Let me start this first post by explaining a little about what to expect on this site.
I am not a professional programmer. In fact, I have never finished any significant piece of software outside of small, closed circles. I am a physicist. And I have written loads of one-off analysis softwares within mathematics, physics, and computer vision. I like programming. I enjoy trying new programming languages, just to see if they are more suited for various tasks.
title: First post
